questionTitle: He is very stubborn, so it will be difficult to ________ him to go.
When the time came to ________ the bill at the hotel she found her purse had been stolen.
The film ________ several scenes that might upset young children.
We're moving out soon because our house is going to be knocked ________ when the new road is built.
We returned our TV set to the shop because it was ________.
Can you come at once? I ________ speak to you urgently.
I've never had to ________ such rudeness before.
I don't think I have ________ eaten Indonesian food before.
All Mike's friends felt sorry ________ him when he had to give up playing football.
Sidney: Shall we stay at home or go for a walk? Margot: Which ________ do yourself?
At first, everything was ________, just like any other day. But then!
He ________ me $20 for mending my bicycle.
________ I tell you yesterday not to touch that dog!
Inflation and its upward ________ is the scourge of our days.
Her guest apologized for causing her so much ________.
I am ________ to come to the meeting on Monday evening; please apologize for my absence.
I suppose I can count ________ you for help in this matter?
They began by experimenting ________ rats.
They brought the land with a ________ to building a new office block.
In all ________ there will never be a third World War.
